sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { animateScroll as scroll } from "react-scroll"; import { FaDribbble, FaBehance, FaLinkedinIn } from "react-icons/fa"; import { FiGithub } from "react-icons/fi"; import { FooterContainer, FooterWrap, FooterLinksContainer, FooterClose, FooterLinksWrapper, FooterLinkItems, FooterLink, SocialMedia, SocialMediaWrap, SocialLogo, WebsiteRights, SocialIcons, SocialIconLink, } from "./FooterElements"; const Footer = () => { const toggleHome = () => { scroll.scrollToTop(); }; return ( Thank you. Get in touch via email or LinkedIn , and let’s discuss how I can help you. Yuya {/* dolla © {new Data().getFullYear()}All Right reserved. */} ); }; export default Footer;
